name: Tirin
description:
Controls:

Use arrow keys to move.

Description:

Tirin is a difficult but fair fun platformer made from

  • 1 liter of Super Mario Bros
  • 2 cups of Portal
  • 3 centimeters of programmer art

Tirin was the second game I made, and the first to make people so angry they called me to complain about it.
